column3: News;Kratie:------ Two women were cursing each other
column5: seriously wounding one of the protagonists in the head. She was taken to the hospital for treatment
column6: while the other woman was arrested and taken to court for legal action.------According to the source
column8: the two women had been having heated words with each. Soon after
column10: weapons were taken and one managed to hit the other about the head with some farming tools
column11: causing bleeding and severe injuries.------The incident happened on September 26
